data.message: Hi Marshall Bruce Mathers The third. I aint gonna lie your my Idol Im a fan not like stan but yeah man im your number 1 fan down under. Are you still mates with Norman and Manix? I think your work on shatterd hearts with skylar grey masterpeice epic work. Love your art. I cant wait for you the king of hip hop to drop a new lp anywyas peace out if your ever in the capital down catch up im a chemical engineer and I love ya rappin styles peace im out
